\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{z-eves}   % oz or z-eves or fuzz styles
\newenvironment{machine}[1]{
    \begin{tabular}{@{\qquad}l}\textbf{\kern-1em machine}\ #1\\ }{
    \\ \textbf{\kern-1em end} \end{tabular} }


\begin{document}

%Imprimir este archivo usando PabloPrueba2.java
\begin{axdef}
 a: \nat \pfun \nat
 \where
\emptyset[\nat] = \{\}  
\emptyset[\power \nat] = \{\}  \\
\emptyset[\nat \rel \nat] = \{\}  \\
\emptyset[\nat \fun \nat] = \{\}  \\
\emptyset[\nat \fun (\nat \pfun \nat)] = \{\} \\



\end{axdef} 

\end{document}
